website_summaries.verdict: Although marketed for older kids and teens, this 1,000-piece dog-themed puzzle could be enjoyed by anyone.
pros: Fun imagery - a dog breed for every letter in the alphabet
Company makes a similar cat-themed puzzle, too
Puzzle is made of 90% recycled materials
cons: Not as easy to solve as some would think

customer_reviews.title: We love the puzzle pictures, but hate missing pieces. Please fix this!
customer_reviews.text: This was the 3rd puzzle we got from Mudpuppy. The first was missing 2 pieces. We blamed ourselves. The 2nd was missing 13 pieces which we knew wasn’t our fault. This one was missing ONE! Quality control is apparently missing at Mudpuppy.
customer_reviews.author: DeepSouthBulldawg

customer_reviews.title: MISSING PIECES -- SORT OF UNSATISFYING
customer_reviews.text: Nothing more annoying that getting 997 pieces of a puzzle together only to find some missing! Second time this has happened and I'm confused. Are these puzzles not cut by a machine???
customer_reviews.author: S. Uihlein

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Gorgeous
customer_reviews.text: This puzzle was so fun to do! The paintings of the cats are fun, there are breeds I'd never heard of so that was interesting, I loved that the background was a light pink instead of a boring white. The pieces are thin but they go together well and stay together when moved, and the colors are gorgeous. Lovely when put together. For me, an avid puzzler, it was about an easy to medium level in terms of toughness.
customer_reviews.author: PuzzleLex

customer_reviews.title: Could have been a great gift, but box was damaged!
customer_reviews.text: For such a lovely puzzle and box, I was bummed that it arrived damaged. There's a large hole on the top right of the box. So now I can't gift it to anyone or leave it sitting out. Rest assured, I opened the Amazon packaging with my hands so the damage was not inflicted by me. They also tape the sides of the box down which forces you to peel off some of the pretty covering of the box, as well. Plastic wrap or some sort of damage-free means of securing the top to the box would have been ideal.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Breeland

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces!!!
customer_reviews.text: This puzzle was missing 3 pieces!!! I'm very very careful with my puzzle pieces and diligent in guarding all the pieces. So disappointed. It's a really cute puzzle. I couldn't find a direct way to contact the seller. I'd like a complete puzzle with all 1000 pieces.
customer_reviews.author: dawgfan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for any cat lover!
customer_reviews.text: This was such an enjoyable puzzle. The perfect gift for any cat lover! The pieces stayed together well and it was more challenging than I expected because of the cursive lettering. Also, it fit on my puzzle table which is always a plus for me.
customer_reviews.author: Al D.Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great puzzle!
customer_reviews.text: I love this puzzle. It's not super challenging, but it's very soothing to work on and is aesthetically very fun and pleasing.
customer_reviews.author: S.

customer_reviews.title: Really Rood Ruzzle (scooby do voice)
customer_reviews.text: Super fun to complete and colourful. Looks like a work of art when finished! Easy fit together pieces with a little snap that lets you know it's the right piece. The dogs are totally cute too
customer_reviews.author: KERRY LYNN KIRSCH

customer_reviews.title: Just enough of a challenge
customer_reviews.text: Cutest puzzle ever, and so fun to put together. It’s challenging (all those blue pieces!) but not so much so that you want to give up. Loved putting this together!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This is a great puzzle for those of us who need a change from landscape and watercolor puzzles! The cats are adorable and fun to put together. Some pieces separated on the edges but this wasn't noticeable after assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly tricky!
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this, I thought it would be a fairly easy puzzle, but it ended up being much harder than I thought! I thought the piece construction was pretty good, and I liked the different cat images. I'm going to keep an eye out for other 1000 piece Mudpuppy puzzles, as I thought this design was rather cute and different from a lot of "typical" puzzle photos.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: What the heck?!?!
customer_reviews.text: Finished my new 997 piece puzzle. Yes, not 1000. After days of working on it 3 pieces are missing.
customer_reviews.author: Ron & Kris McClory

customer_reviews.title: A perfect puzzle
customer_reviews.text: My adult daughter LOVED doing this puzzle over the holidays! It's got a cute design and is challenging without being impossible. She also loved the dog puzzle this company makes.
customer_reviews.author: CAWoman

customer_reviews.title: Repackaged mess
customer_reviews.text: I received this puzzle and the box has been taped up like someone had already opened it. I didn’t buy a 2nd hand puzzle. Very disappointed ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Brandon G

customer_reviews.title: Fun, cute puzzle
customer_reviews.text: So much fun putting this together! Challenging, but so satisfying whenever I assembled one of the cats! Cute cute cute!
customer_reviews.author: Rowena

customer_reviews.title: Item misdelivered to another state
customer_reviews.text: Waited awhile to get this puzzle and it was delivered to an address many states away. Very disappointing...I asked for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Susan J

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Fun
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love this puzzle! The artwork is adorable and the pieces were well cut and fit together really well. I found it to be challenging but not impossible. Perfect gift for a crazy cat lady like me!
customer_reviews.author: NaperMom

customer_reviews.title: Great puzzle
customer_reviews.text: High quality puzzle. Little challenging to put together but it ends up so beautiful. Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.author: 3dogs1cat

customer_reviews.title: Cute but badly designed
customer_reviews.text: This puzzle is adorable and in a very nice box. BUT it is hard to do. Sometimes you’re not sure if pieces really fit together. There is very little variety in the shape of the pieces. Cute picture but annoying to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Skipper

customer_reviews.title: Durable and fun puzzle for the whole family!
customer_reviews.text: Super fun puzzle to do with my elementary aged school children during quarantine! Great quality puzzle and super fun design for cat loving families
customer_reviews.author: C. Cavanaugh

customer_reviews.title: The pieces were very small and thin. Although the ...
customer_reviews.text: The pieces were very small and thin. Although the puzzle was brand new, about 20% of the pieces were damaged and the backs were already peeling off. Will be returning. On the bright side, the kitty cat puzzle was very cute. I just wouldn't buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand of puzzles this is the second one
customer_reviews.text: Mudpuppy makes really artistic puzzles and fun--takes our minds of the crazy news at night
customer_reviews.author: Moni

customer_reviews.title: Great family fun
customer_reviews.text: Great fun. It took us exactly a week to get it done but it was fun and the entire family got into it.
customer_reviews.author: Damaris

customer_reviews.title: Love this puzzle!!
customer_reviews.text: This puzzle is great! My 7yr old daughter loved it. It took her a week to put it together and was enough of a challenge for her but not too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Tate

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dog lovers!
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute idea for a puzzle. Immediately my girls were staking claim on the dogs they wanted to do! Good quality and image of the puzzle!
customer_reviews.author: nanamamar

customer_reviews.title: Family Time
customer_reviews.text: My favorite puzzle I've ever done. A great one to leave out as family walk past they can resist to stop help and get sucked in.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri O.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for cat lovers
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun puzzle to complete — lots of different colors and patterns. Very cute design!
customer_reviews.author: Cow Hollow Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Five stars
customer_reviews.text: My mom wanted this puzzle, I ordered it for her, and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Reschke

customer_reviews.title: Dog lover with a recent love for puzzles.
customer_reviews.text: Super cute puzzle and fun for the entire family! Mudpuppy always makes cute puzzles. The blue portions of the puzzle made it challenging, but that's half the fun. If you want a causal puzzle or if you aren't patient, I would suggest a 500-piece puzzle.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: Fun family puzzle
customer_reviews.text: This wss the perfect, fun puzzle for my family and I during the pandemic. So much fun that we ended up buying the hot dog puzzle as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Spent a weekend with my daughter and put this together. So much fun! Excellent quality puzzle
customer_reviews.author: Cherrywidow

customer_reviews.title: Cute but hard
customer_reviews.text: This puzzle was hard!!! I am so glad I purchased it for quarantine because it definitely gave me something to do!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Glad to see Havanese are represented!  Fun puzzle!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for friends who have a Havanese who was caught helping them put it together - haha They loved it!
customer_reviews.author: P Young

customer_reviews.title: Super hard but fun images
customer_reviews.text: This puzzle was super hard to do the old fashioned way of edges then interior. Had to start with the interior to actually make any progress. Great images!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Fun puzzle
customer_reviews.text: Well made, pieces fit easily together and it's just super cute!
customer_reviews.author: shelliebean

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece.
customer_reviews.text: Missing piece. So upset. Spent a lot of time putting it together to find out one piece was missing. What will be done to fix this?
customer_reviews.author: McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: Recommend! Set it off!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the part of the puzzle that had the dog on it. Kachow!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Send it to a niece or nephew as a surprise Pandemic gift
customer_reviews.text: Actually don't know because I gave it as a surprise gift.
customer_reviews.author: SteaknPotato

customer_reviews.title: Challenging!
customer_reviews.text: Love Mudpuppy puzzles!!! This one was so much fun but really challenging. So may not be suitable for younger kids.
customer_reviews.author: patrick robison

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece
customer_reviews.text: The puzzle is adorable and challenging but arrived with 999 pieces. So frustrating! Other reviewers have also been missing pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Scanlan

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with this cute puzzle! So fun to put together
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely puzzle during covid
customer_reviews.text: Kept us busy for a few hours, would build again
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Cute , fun puzzle but missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: 2 missing pieces right out of the box! Otherwise, this is a cute puzzle that was fun to work.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lovering

customer_reviews.title: More difficult than expected, but rewarding
customer_reviews.text: My family worked on this over the holidays. It was tougher than I expected, but very rewarding. The detailed cat drawings are darling.
customer_reviews.author: Summery

customer_reviews.title: Missing one piece
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful puzzle but very disappointed. Just finished and it is missing one piece!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Stone

customer_reviews.title: Great photo...not the best quality pieces
customer_reviews.text: Fun little puzzle to put together. Wasn't the best quality pieces that snapped together, but still fun overall.
customer_reviews.author: allimo

customer_reviews.title: an excellent balance between challenge and fun
customer_reviews.text: Very cute illustration and, for me, an excellent balance between challenge and fun. Really enjoyed this!
customer_reviews.author: margonaute

customer_reviews.title: Fun but missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Really fun puzzle with a cute graphic. Except for the fact that I am missing 16 pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Katrice Keaton

customer_reviews.title: ... received was missing 6 pieces which is a huge disappointment when you get to the end
customer_reviews.text: Mudpuppy makes quality puzzles but the one we received was missing 6 pieces which is a huge disappointment when you get to the end.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Schutt

customer_reviews.title: Fun and not too hard
customer_reviews.text: This was a fun puzzle to do while trying to wait out the SIP orders. Not too hard but not too easy.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Best puzzle for the price
customer_reviews.text: Loved this puzzle! Very fun theme and easily put together!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute Kitties
customer_reviews.text: This was a great puzzle. Hint: It goes faster if you leave the border for last.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great jigsaw puzzle
customer_reviews.text: Challenging puzzle but it is doable. Takes some time to complete.
customer_reviews.author: Cdsmckean

customer_reviews.title: very cute puzzle
customer_reviews.text: nice quality, takes a while to put it up , it is a pretty difficult puzzle
customer_reviews.author: Jingyi Ma

customer_reviews.title: Came dented and taped shut
customer_reviews.text: The puzzle arrived dented and with the edges clear-taped shut
customer_reviews.author: cristina mendiola

customer_reviews.title: It's a another nice cat puzzle for my collection
customer_reviews.text: It's a another nice cat puzzle for my collection, but the pink backround was very light, looked pink on the picture but almost white in reality.
customer_reviews.author: Ayelet Yarnitsky

customer_reviews.title: Quirky A to Z kitty cats make for a fun puzzle!
customer_reviews.text: Fun puzzle, high quality pieces. Very cute design. The whole family enjoyed it.
customer_reviews.author: RM Brown

customer_reviews.title: Fun puzzle
customer_reviews.text: Super cute puzzle! Framed the poster for my girls’ room.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle J. Britt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fun for all ages. Hardest part was the plain pink straight pieces
customer_reviews.author: Dave Willig

customer_reviews.title: Meow? Meow!
customer_reviews.text: Meow meow, meow. Meow, meow! Meow; meow meow meow. Meow? Meow!
customer_reviews.author: Executive Search

customer_reviews.title: Fun but colors don't match
customer_reviews.text: Fun puzzle. The colors on the cover don't match the colors in the puzzle, which made assembly a bit tricky.
customer_reviews.author: S. Chmelik

product_meta.title: Mudpuppy Hot Dogs A-Z Puzzle, 1,000 Piece Dog Jigsaw Puzzle, 27”x20”, Perfect for Ages 8-99+, Family Puzzle to Celebrate Dogs, Illustrations of 26 Dog Breeds, Great Gift for Dog Lovers
product_meta.description:
Style:Hot DogsIf you and your family love dogs this puzzle is for you! The 1,000-piece Hot Dogs A-Z puzzle is perfect for kids and those young at heart, ages 8 to 99 and up. Creatively illustrated, the puzzle features 26 dog breeds, one for each letter of the alphabet. The whole family will enjoy learning about some common – Yorkie, Chihuahua, French Bulldog – and uncommon – Zuchon, Havanese, Komondor – dog breeds. And finding some favorite hidden dog treats as well! The finished puzzle measures 20” x 27” and is fun for the entire family to complete together. The durable 11.25” x 8.25” x 2” storage box shows the completed puzzle artwork and is an ideal place to keep pieces safe, together, and free from damage. Also makes a great gift! Painter and illustrator Carolyn Gavin created the artwork depicted in this puzzle. The box includes an insert with more information about the artist and her vibrant artwork. For over 25 years, Mudpuppy has created quality non-digital puzzles, games, and toys for children and families that facilitate creative play and imaginative thinking. All Mudpuppy products adhere to CPSIA, ASTM, and CE Safety Regulations. Environmentally conscious, the puzzle greyboard contains 90% recycled paper, the packaging contains 70% recycled paper, and it is printed with nontoxic inks.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Put together this 1000 piece family puzzle from Mudpuppy to reveal a series of playful "hot dogs" that represent each letter of the Alphabet. This fun and eye-catching design is by Carolyn Gavin. The pieces come packaged in a sturdy and easy-to-wrap box, perfect for gifting, reuse, and storage.
feature_bullets: 1,000-PIECE PUZZLE: The 1,000-piece Hot Dogs A-Z puzzle is perfect for kids and those young at heart, ages 8 to 99 and up. The finished puzzle measures 20” x 27” and is fun for the entire family to complete together.

26 DOGS: Creatively illustrated, the puzzle features 26 dog breeds, one for each letter of the alphabet. The whole family will enjoy learning about some common and uncommon dog breeds. And finding some favorite hidden dog treats as well.
STURDY STORAGE BOX: The durable 11.25” x 8.25” x 2” storage box shows the completed puzzle artwork and is an ideal place to keep pieces safe, together, and free from damage. Also makes a great gift!
PUZZLE ART: Painter and illustrator Carolyn Gavin created the artwork depicted in this puzzle. The box includes an insert with more information about the artist and her vibrant artwork.

SCREEN-FREE FUN: For over 25 years, Mudpuppy has created quality non-digital puzzles, games, and toys for children and families that facilitate creative play and imaginative thinking. All Mudpuppy products adhere to CPSIA, ASTM, and CE Safety Regulations.
